Text.Name: Item_BoarLeather
Text.ThingName: หนังหมูป่า
Text.Desc: Boar skin with a rough texture, but it's relatively firm.
Text.Item.BeMaterial.NamePrefix: หนังหมูป่า

Text.Name: Item_RabbitLeather
Text.ThingName: หนังกระต่าย
Text.Desc: The fur of a rabbit, very soft and warm.
Text.Item.BeMaterial.NamePrefix: หนังกระต่าย

Text.Name: Item_BearLeather
Text.Desc: The fur of a bear, very soft and warm.

Text.Name: Item_WolfLeather
Text.ThingName: หนังหมาป่า
Text.Desc: A piece of wolf hide, firm and durable.
Text.Item.BeMaterial.NamePrefix: หนังหมาป่า

Text.Name: Item_FeiLeather
Text.Desc: Hide of the demon beast Fei with magical power dwelling within it. Warm in winter and cool in summer. It is even capable of blocking พลังชี่ damage.

Text.Name: Item_LuShuLeather
Text.Desc: Hide of the spirit beast Lushu, with magical power dwelling within it. Warm in winter and cool in summer. It is even capable of blocking พลังชี่ damage.

Text.Name: Item_CattleLeather
Text.ThingName: หนังกระทิง
Text.Desc: A piece of bull hide, firm and durable.
Text.Item.BeMaterial.NamePrefix: หนังกระทิง

Text.Name: Item_TigerLeather
Text.Desc: A piece of tiger hide, firm and durable.

Text.Name: Item_YaoLeather
Text.ThingName: หนังสัตว์ปีศาจ
Text.Desc: Hide of a demon beast, with demonic power dwelling within it. Warm in winter and cool in summer. It is even capable of blocking พลังชี่ damage.

Text.Name: Item_YaoLeather1
Text.ThingName: หนังสัตว์ปีศาจแข็ง
Text.Desc: Hide of a great demon beast, with powerful demonic power dwelling within it. Warm in winter and cool in summer. It is even capable of effectively blocking พลังชี่ damage.
Text.Item.BeMaterial.NamePrefix: หนังปีศาจแข็ง
